repositories.deploy: cd /var/www/tochka-dostupa-5 && sudo service tochka-dostupa-5-client stop && sudo kill $(sudo lsof -t -i:3000) && git pull origin master && cd client && yarn build && sudo service tochka-dostupa-5-client start
cd /var/www/Tochka-Dostupa && sudo service Tochka-Dostupa stop && sudo kill $(sudo lsof -t -i:3003) && git pull origin master && yarn build && sudo service Tochka-Dostupa start
cd /var/www/NET-logo && sudo service NET-logo stop && sudo kill $(sudo lsof -t -i:3010) && git pull origin master && cd parcel && yarn build && sudo service NET-logo start
